name: ░▒▓▌Neon_link_focus▐▓▒░
description:
Gives focused links an aesthetically pleasing neon glow (+ visited link indication) and selections a non-disruptive background colour. Enough said; try it. 
Questions, Queries, Suggestions, Feedback? please comment...

░▒▓▌Yeshu'_D'nsareth_Mshieho_Aloho_Deilan▐▓▒░
additional_info:
-Chrome/ium support dropped, link behaviour is different from Firefox.

-Firefox has disabled advanced styling of ":visited" links (for security reasons); so this update uses CurrentColor as a workaround (ofcourse, this means white-colored links can be illegible)...
